snippet: The former Los Angeles Lakers and Knicks forward Metta World Peace has signed on to work as a girls’ high school coach at Palisades Charter High School in Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: The former Los Angeles Lakers and Knicks forward Metta World Peace has signed on to work as a girls’ high school coach at Palisades Charter High School in Los Angeles.

headline.main: New Challenge for Metta World Peace
